data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Ufeus Grote with the description of a new species from Arizona (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Noctuinae, Xylenini, Ufeina)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lafontaine, J. Donald, Walsh, J. Bruce (2013): A revision of the genus Ufeus Grote with the description of a new species from Arizona (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Noctuinae, Xylenini, Ufeina). ZooKeys 264: 193-207, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.264.3526, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.264.3526
